pyper.system.add_stage()¶

Add an empty stage.

pyper.system.add_task(func: Callable, args: List[Any], nprocs: int)¶

Add a task to current stage.

Parameters

  • {Callable} -- function to be called in the task (func) –

  • {List[Any]} -- function arguments (args) –

  • {int} -- number of processors for the task (nprocs) –

pyper.system.mpirun(tasks: Union[List[Tuple[str, str, int]], Tuple[str, str, int]])¶

Run mpi tasks.

Parameters

{Union[List[Tuple[str, str, int]], Tuple[str, str, int]]} -- path, command and number of processors (tasks) –

Returns

int – exit code of the system call
